    • Method Detail

      • getHeapMemoryUsage

        static MemoryUsage getHeapMemoryUsage()
        Return the sum of the usage in all heap-based pools.
        Returns:
        the memory usage for heap-based pools.

      • getNonHeapMemoryUsage

        static MemoryUsage getNonHeapMemoryUsage()
        Return the sum of the usage in all non-heap-based pools.
        Returns:
        the memory usage for non-heap-based pools.

      • getObjectPendingFinalizationCount

        static int getObjectPendingFinalizationCount()
        Return the number of objects waiting for finalization.
        Returns:
        the number of finalizable objects.

      • isVerbose

        static boolean isVerbose()
        Returns true if some level of verbosity is on.
        Returns:
        true if verbosity is greater than 0.

      • setVerbose

        static void setVerbose(boolean verbose)
        Turns on or off verbosity. MMTk has a more detailed level of verbosity, so we simply map true to level 1.
        Parameters:
        verbose - the new verbosity setting.

      • getUsage

        private static MemoryUsage getUsage(boolean immortal)
        Totals the memory usage from all the pools that are either mortal or immortal.

        Non-heap pools are immortal, heap pools are non-immortal.

        Parameters:
        immortal - true if the spaces counted should be immortal.
        Returns:
        the memory usage overall.
